Shaped in the likeness of a dragon and adorned with Draconic runes, this handsome amulet is a boon to dragonborn.

Neck Slot: Uncommon

Enhancement Bonus: Fortitude, Reflex, and Will

Property:

If you are a dragonborn, gain resist 10 to the same type of damage dealt by your dragon breath power. After you use your dragon breath power, the resistance increases to 20 until the end of your next turn.

Level 24: Resist 15, resist 30 after using dragon breath.

Level 29: Resist 20, resist 40 after using dragon breath.

Power âœ¦ Daily (Immediate Reaction)

Use this power when you become bloodied. If you have the dragon breath power, you can use it even if you have already expended it this encounter.
